name: Hop Hop Pop
description:
Get into the flow and master the art of hopping!

Tap to make your Hopper jump.
Pick up as many yellow blocks as possible while avoiding the red mines.

Watch your Hopper grow with each pick-up, making it harder to navigate the field… fortunately, a checkpoint is never far away, converting collected blocks into a solid score and reverting your Hopper back to its original size.

Don’t forget to pick up the gem blocks along the way to unlock new, fun Hoppers of all shapes and forms.

Who amongst your friends will collect the most blocks? There is only one way to find out…

Features:
* Fun, minimalist gameplay.
* New Hoppers to unlock.
* High score leaderboards.
* Achievements.
